author: manuel923854
content: I tried sending an e-mail to protocol-fellowship-group@ethereum.org but I got a message that says "We're writing to let you know that the group you tried to contact (protocol-fellowship-group) may not exist, or you may not have permission to post messages to the group.". How did you request to be added to the group?
